description.displayText: Sindy was great helping my husband while I was away. He needs an 'extra pair of hands' to help him as he has health and mobility issues. Sindy is super conscientious, helpful and kind. She also responds quickly. I would definitely hire her again!
description.originalText: Sindy was great helping my husband while I was away. He needs an 'extra pair of hands' to help him as he has health and mobility issues. Sindy is super conscientious, helpful and kind. She also responds quickly. I would definitely hire her again!

description.displayText: Sindy has been working with my family for the last several years to help care for my aging grandmother who has had increasing dementia in the time Sindy has been with us. She is no less than a god send. She has become a member of our family and cared for my grandmother like her own. You couldn't ask for anyone better, especially for someone with dementia or other memory related ailments.
description.originalText: Sindy has been working with my family for the last several years to help care for my aging grandmother who has had increasing dementia in the time Sindy has been with us. She is no less than a god send. She has become a member of our family and cared for my grandmother like her own. You couldn't ask for anyone better, especially for someone with dementia or other memory related ailments.

description.displayText: Sindy was an incredible help with my aging grandmother who suffers from dementia. She has been a huge asset and also a lovely addition in our home. It's easy for people with Dementia to be ignored, but Sindy has always spoken directly to my grandmother and engaged her. It would be an understatement to say that she's been a godsend. Also my grandmother loves her! The only reason we are parting ways is that my grandmother is moving across the country for logistical reasons. I honestly cannot recommend this wonderful woman strongly enough!
description.originalText: Sindy was an incredible help with my aging grandmother who suffers from dementia. She has been a huge asset and also a lovely addition in our home. description.displayText: Sindy cared for my mother-in-law, M., for several years. M. lived with Alzheimer's disease--at first, she was able to live in her apartment by herself, then she transitioned to an assisted living facility. Sindy was with us for the entire journey. M. always saw Sindy as a friend, and vice versa--this was a rare and unusual gift in the world of senior care, and we are certain that Sindy's care made a difference in M.'s health and quality of life. Since M.'s passing, Sindy has also babysat for our 2 small daughters, both under the age of 3, showing the same level of sensitivity and care. We originally found Sindy on care.com, and are happy we did!

description.displayText: She is a very dedicated person. She spent three years with us taking care of dad and could not of asked for a better caregiver. We all took a great likeness to her, and will recommend her to your team for consideration. I hope this review has met your expectation.
description.originalText: She is a very dedicated person. She spent three years with us taking care of dad and could not of asked for a better caregiver. We all took a great likeness to her, and will recommend her to your team for consideration. I hope this review has met your expectation.

description.displayText: Sindy has done housekeeping for me for five years.  She has also cared for my daughter.  She is highly responsible, reliable, trustworthy and independent.  She is very thorough and efficient at cleaning.  Most importantly, she is a very kind and loving person.  I highly recommend her!
description.originalText: Sindy has done housekeeping for me for five years.  She has also cared for my daughter.  She is highly responsible, reliable, trustworthy and independent.  She is very thorough and efficient at cleaning.  Most importantly, she is a very kind and loving person.  I highly recommend her!

description.displayText: I have known Sindy all her life.  She is a responsible and caring woman with the common sense, compassion, and skills necessary to properly care for another person.  At the same time, she is interesting and entertaining and would also provide stimulating companionship.  I would recommend her strongly for employment.
